verbose_text: Formation of recycling vesicles containing the Tfn - TfnR complex at REs is regulated by a Rab family small GTPase, Rab11, since expression of a dominant negative Rab11a mutant, Rab11a (S25N), inhibited formation of recycling vesicles and consequently induced tubulation of perinuclear compartments containing endocytosed Tfn and TfnR.
evidence: expression of a dominant-negative Rab11a mutant, Rab11a
